FuncDef: The display igmp-snooping port-info command displays information about member ports on the router, including static member ports, SSM mapping-enabled ports, and dynamic member ports.
CLIs: display igmp-snooping port-info [ { vlan <vlan-id> | vsi <vsi-name> } [ group-address <group-address> ] ] [ slot <slot-id> ] [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about multicast interfaces in a specified VLAN.
The vlan-id value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Displays information about member ports in a specified VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays information about interfaces related to a specified multicast group in a VSI.
The value ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about member ports on a specified interface board.
-

Displays detailed information about member ports.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display igmp-snooping port-info vsi v1 verbose
The port information of Group 226.0.0.1 on VSI v1, VLAN 6:
Time of this group has been up : 01:23:25
Time of this source has been up : 01:23:25
List of ports in include mode :
Time of this port has been up as a host-port : 01:23:25
Remain time of port expire as dynamic host-port : --
Host-port flags : Static    There are 1 port(s) in include mode.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display igmp-snooping port-info command has output only after IGMP snooping is enabled globally, in a VLAN/VSI.
Information about a member port is displayed only when the member port is in the Up state. When using the display igmp-snooping port-info command, note the following points:
If the display igmp snooping port-info command is run, information about all multicast interfaces is displayed.If the display igmp snooping port-info vlan command is run, information about all multicast interfaces in a specified VLAN is displayed.If the display igmp snooping port-info vsi command is run, information about all multicast interfaces in a specified VSI is displayed.If the display igmp snooping port-info vlan group-address command is run, information about the member ports of a specified multicast group in a specified VLAN is displayed.If the display igmp snooping port-info vsi group-address command is run, information about the member ports of a specified multicast group in a specified VSI is displayed.
